Mayor
=====

Mayor Breann Buxkemper
======================

![SMB_4662](http://www.levellandtexas.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6268)

[mayor@levellandtexas.org](mailto:mayor@levellandtexas.org)
-----------------------------------------------------------

Mayor Breann Buxkemper was elected to serve Levelland in May of 2024 and is serving her first 3-year term as Mayor. Mayor Buxkemper previously served as Council Member for District C and Mayor Pro Tem.

Breann is involved in many City organizations and has served on multiple committees before running for Council. She is an advocate for the City of Levelland and works hard to make it the best community possible.

Breann works at the Hockley County School Employee Credit Union and is married to Matt Buxkemper. They have a son and a daughter.
